categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Rey's Survival Guide is a book written by Jason Fry based on the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Its story is told as an in-universe journal written by Jakku scavenger Rey. The book was published by Studio Fun International on December 18, 2015, and was later included in the Star Wars 3-Book Gift Set, released on November 22, 2016.

Complete with stories, secrets, and insights, this guide will immerse readers in the world of Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Discover what you need to survive the hostile planet, Jakku. What secrets lurk inside the ship graveyard? What do you want to salvage? What should you avoid to stay alive? Includes gatefolds with exclusive artifacts including starship schematics and more!

The book includes several inserts which can be opened. One of them, labeled "Imperial Army Field Rations Instruction Kit," has an error: the text refers to the Empire and features the Imperial logo, but the illustration depicts a First Order stormtrooper helmet.
